solution_line_template: The Kickers scored twice as many as {kickers_first_period_goals} goals in the second period, so {twice_factor}*{kickers_first_period_goals} = <<{twice_factor}*{kickers_first_period_goals}={kickers_second_period_goals}>>{kickers_second_period_goals} goals

The Spiders scored half as many as The Kickers' {kickers_first_period_goals} goals from the 1st period so {half_factor}*{kickers_first_period_goals} = <<{kickers_first_period_goals}*{half_factor}={spiders_first_period_goals}>>{spiders_first_period_goals} goal in the first period

The Spiders scored twice as many as The Kickers' {kickers_second_period_goals} goals from the second period, so {twice_factor}*{kickers_second_period_goals} = <<{twice_factor}*{kickers_second_period_goals}={spiders_second_period_goals}>>{spiders_second_period_goals} goals in the second period
